com.elulian.CustomerSecurityManagementSystem.dao

Interface IBaseDAO<T,ID extends java.io.Serializable>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - Entity to
    ID - Entity's id
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ICustomerInfoDAO, IRiskRankDAO, IThresholdDAO, IUserInfoDAO
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseDAO, CustomerInfoDAO, RiskRankDAO, ThresholdDAO, UserInfoDAO

    public interface IBaseDAO<T,ID extends java.io.Serializable>
    The Interface to execute CRUD command for T entity.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    cloudlu

      • findById

        T findById(ID id)
        R: find T by Id.
        Parameters:
        id - T's Id
        Returns:
        If id is not exist (e.g. id = null), return null, else return T with ID equals id.

        Returns:
